about.text: Embodying the grace and authority of ancient royalty, Queen Cleo is a no-nonsense life coach who believes that everyone should live grandly—or not at all. With her razor-sharp wit and brutally honest advice, she helps her followers build empires of their own, one 'pyramid' at a time.

flat.title: Rule Your Life—Or Else
flat.avatar_alt: A regal portrait of Queen Cleo

items.text: Greetings, subjects! I am [Queen Cleo](https://commandyourkingdom.com/cleo), a life coach who doesn't mince words—or heads. With a lineage that may or may not trace back to the great pharaohs, I bring royal standards to modern living. If you're over 35 and your 500-foot burial pyramid isn't at least 85% complete, we need to talk.
items.title: Bow Before Betterment

items.text: Throughout my reign in the self-improvement realm, I've transformed the lives of countless individuals (and a few small nations). My collaborations include partnerships with [The Sphinx Society](https://sphinxsociety.com) and [Pyramid Schemes Inc.](https://pyramidschemes.com). I've hosted sold-out seminars like 'Conquer or Be Conquered: There Is No Middle Ground.'
items.title: Building Empires, One Soul at a Time

items.text: My methods combine ancient wisdom with modern ruthlessness. Forget your 'smart goals'—if you're not etching your achievements into stone tablets, are you even trying? I share my edicts on [Royal Decrees](https://commandyourkingdom.com/royal-decrees), my daily vlog where I dispense advice like, 'Sleep is for the weak; immortality awaits the relentless.'
items.title: Wisdom as Old as Time

items.text: If you're ready to stop building sandcastles and start constructing monuments, I'm here to lead you. Just remember: in my court, excuses are fed to the crocodiles. Your journey to greatness begins when you accept that mediocrity is a fate worse than a snake bite.
items.title: Your Destiny Awaits—Assuming You Seize It

items.text:
For those bold enough to seek true transformation, I offer exclusive access to my inner circle. Contact my vizier at [cleo@commandyourkingdom.com](mailto:cleo@commandyourkingdom.com). But be warned: only the serious need apply. Time is precious, and mine is worth more than all the gold of the Nile.

Imperiously yours,
Queen Cleo
items.title: Join My Inner Circle (If You Dare)

identity.name: Queen Cleo
identity.tagline: Because ruling yourself is the first step to ruling the world.

items.title: Empire Builder Masterclass
items.description: A comprehensive program teaching you how to expand your influence, subdue your weaknesses, and annex the territories of your life that matter.

items.title: The Sphinx Society
items.description: An elite group for those who have proven themselves worthy. Membership is by invitation only, and inquiries are generally ignored.

items.title: Royal Decrees Vlog
items.description: Daily videos where I address common failings among my subjects and outline the severe steps needed for improvement.
Founded a life coaching empire that leaves no room for excuses or failure. Implemented a zero-tolerance policy for mediocrity.
Partnered with luxury brands to promote products that symbolize success and wealth. Emphasized that if you have to ask the price, you can't afford it.
Offered consulting services to failing monarchies and businesses, often resulting in hostile takeovers or complete restructuring (sometimes both).
Traveled the world studying different leadership styles and overthrowing them where necessary. Learned that true power is taken, not given.
Declared divine status at an early age. Spent formative years honing skills in manipulation, strategic alliance formation, and dramatic entrances.
